title: Hiraku Nakajima
snippet: Although I send emails to ask help as the President of the IMU, they are sent from a special email address which has mathunion.org after @. They are also digitally signed.

title: Hiraku Nakajima (Kavli IPMU) elected President of the International Mathematical Union | The University of Tokyo
snippet: Hiraku Nakajima, Professor at the Kavli Institute for the Physics and Mathematics of the Universe (Kavli IPMU), has been elected the upcoming President of the International Mathematical Union (IMU), it was announced at the IMU general assembly ...

title: Curriculum Vitae Hiraku Nakajima
snippet: To promote international cooperation in mathematics · To support and assist the International Congress of Mathematicians and other international scientific meetings or conferences

title: CGTN exclusive: IMU President Hiraku Nakajima speaks on math cooperation, AI, young talents
snippet: During the event, CGTN's Liu Jiaxin spoke with Hiraku Nakajima, president of the International Mathematical Union (IMU) and professor at the University of Tokyo, about his passion for geometric representation theory, global cooperation, AI ...
